experiment_info.name: larger_popsize_exploration
experiment_info.description: Use popsize=8 (vs default ~4-5) for better exploration, with fewer generations
experiment_info.hypothesis: Larger population might provide better exploration

reason_aborted: DUPLICATE of larger_cmaes_population (EXP_LARGER_POPSIZE_001) which already tested this. Additionally, default popsize for 2-source is already ~8, so popsize=8 is NOT larger than default.

larger_cmaes_population.finding: Larger popsize is WORSE in both accuracy and time. Reduces number of generations.

default_popsize_values.note: Proposed popsize=8 is already the default for 2-source problems
